roleset.name: get
roleset.note: CAPTURE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls steal-10.5. (from capture.01-v)
CAPTURE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry capture.01, OntoNotes grouping capture-n senses 1, 2,& 3; maps to VN class steal-10.5. Framed by Claire. (from capture.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Most of the volume came from [trades]-1 designed *trace* *trace*-1 to capture the stock's next dividend; Texaco has a yield of 5.6% and goes ex-dividend today.

example.name: capture a perp
example.text: Israeli intelligence agents have captured 16 Palestinians believed involved in the mob killings of two Israeli soldiers .
example.arg: 16 Palestinians believed involved in the mob killings of two Israeli soldiers

example.name: All arguments
example.text: The enemy's capture of the capital city disheartened the citizenry.

example.name: All arguments, new domain
example.text: The ion's capture of an electron gives it a neutral charge.

example.name: All arguments, alternate syntax
example.text: The trajectory of the comet will prevent its capture by the sun.
